subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets, blessed with pitching, need to pursue a deal with a genuine power hitter like Yoenis Cespedes, who led the team to the National League pennant last season.
snippet: The Mets, blessed with pitching, need to pursue a deal with a genuine power hitter like Yoenis Cespedes, who led the team to the National League pennant last season.
